MMU
CSL ARCH Module » A15

Files

file  mmu_a15.h
 This file contains the interfaces present in the A15 MMU HAL. This also contains some related macros, structures and enums. This implementation supports only two levels of translation tables. Physical address is 40 bits long instead of 32 bits.

 This structure defines the attributes of A15 MMU descriptor. More...

Macros

#define MMU_A15_NUM_FIRST_LEVEL_BUFFER_ENTRIES   ((uint32_t) 4U)
 This macro defines the number of entries in first level table buffer.
 
#define MMU_A15_NUM_SECOND_LEVEL_BUFFER_ENTRIES   ((uint32_t) 512U)
 This macro defines the number of entries in second level table buffer.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_MEM_SPACE_SECURE   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 This macro defines that next table is in secure space.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_MEM_SPACE_NON_SECURE   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 This macro defines that next table is in non-secure space.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_ACC_PERM_NO_EFFECT   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 This macro defines the access permissions for look-up as no effect.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_ACC_PERM_NO_ACCESS_PL0   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 This macro defines the access permissions for look-up as no access at PL0.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_ACC_PERM_NO_WR   ((uint32_t) 2U)
 This macro defines the access permissions for look-up as no write access.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_ACC_PERM_NO_WR_NO_RD_PL0   ((uint32_t) 3U)
 This macro defines the access permissions for look-up as no write access and no read access at PL0.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_XN_NO_EFFECT   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 This macro defines the execute never bit for subsequent look-up as no effect.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_XN_ALWAYS_ON   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 This macro defines the execute never bit for subsequent look-up as always 1.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_PXN_NO_EFFECT   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 This macro defines the privilege execute never bit for subsequent look-up as no effect.
 
#define MMU_A15_NT_PXN_ALWAYS_ON   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 This macro defines the privilege execute never bit for subsequent look-up as always 1.
 
#define MMU_A15_XN_ENABLE   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 This macro enables the execute never bit.
 
#define MMU_A15_XN_DISABLE   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 This macro disables the execute never bit.
 
#define MMU_A15_PXN_ENABLE   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 This macro enables the privilege execute never bit.
 
#define MMU_A15_PXN_DISABLE   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 This macro disables the privilege execute never bit.
 
#define MMU_A15_CONTIGUOUS_HINT_ENABLE   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 This macro enables the contiguous hint.
 
#define MMU_A15_CONTIGUOUS_HINT_DISABLE   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 This macro disables the contiguous hint.

Detailed Description

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct mmuA15DescriptorAttrs mmuA15DescriptorAttrs_t

This structure defines the attributes of A15 MMU descriptor.

Details Table Descriptor: Bits[58:52] are Ignored Bits[51:40] are UNK(Unknown on fault)/SBZP (Should be zero or preserved) Bits [39:12] Contain Next table address, Bits[11:0] of table address are 0 Bits [11:2] Ignored Block Descriptor: Bits[63:52] Upper Block Attributes Bits[51:40] are UNK(Unknown on fault)/SBZP (Should be zero or preserved) Bits[39:12] For first level descriptor Bits[39:30] are output address of 1 GB block, Bits[29:12] are UNK/SBZP For second level descriptor Bits[39:21] are output address of 2 MB block, Bits[29:12] are UNK/SBZP For third level descriptor Bits[39:12] are output address of 4 KB page. Bits[11:2] are Lower Block Attributes

typedef struct mmuA15ModuleTable mmuA15ModuleTable_t

This structure defines the table of the MMU module.

Note
This structure should be placed at an address that is 16K aligned.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum mmuA15DescriptorType

Enum to select the MMU descriptor type.

Enumerator
MMU_A15_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_INVALID0 

Descriptor type is Invalid0

MMU_A15_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_BLOCK 

Descriptor type is Block

MMU_A15_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_INVALID1 

Descriptor type is Invalid1

MMU_A15_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_TABLE 

Descriptor type is Table
